org.waarp.openr66.client

Class TransferArgs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.client.TransferArgs

  • public class TransferArgs
extends Object
    Transfer arguments:

    -to Specify the requested Host
    (-id | Specify the id of transfer
    (-file Specify the file path to operate on
    -rule )) Specify the Rule
    [-block ] Specify the block size
    [-nofollow] Specify the transfer should not integrate a FOLLOW id
    [-md5] Specify the option to have a hash computed for the transfer
    [-delay ] Specify the delay time as an epoch time or '+' a delay in ms
    [-start ] Specify the start time as yyyyMMddHHmmss
    [-info ) Specify the transfer information (generally in last position)
    [-nolog] Specify to not log anything included database once the transfer is done
    [-notlogWarn | Specify to log final result as Info if OK
    -logWarn] Specify to log final result as Warn if OK

    • Method Detail

      • printHelp

        public static void printHelp()
        Print to standard output the help of this command

      • getParamsInternal

        public static TransferArgs getParamsInternal(int rank,
                                             String[] args,
                                             boolean analyseFollow)
        Analyze the parameters according to TransferArgs options

        Transfer arguments:

        -to Specify the requested Host
        (-id | Specify the id of transfer
        (-file Specify the file path to operate on
        -rule )) Specify the Rule
        [-block ] Specify the block size
        [-nofollow] Specify the transfer should not integrate a FOLLOW id
        [-md5] Specify the option to have a hash computed for the transfer
        [-delay ] Specify the delay time as an epoch time or '+' a delay in ms
        [-start ] Specify the start time as yyyyMMddHHmmss
        [-info ) Specify the transfer information (generally in last position)
        [-nolog] Specify to not log anything included database once the transfer is done
        [-notlogWarn | Specify to log final result as Info if OK
        -logWarn] Specify to log final result as Warn if OK
        Parameters:
        rank - the rank to analyze from
        args - the argument to analyze
        analyseFollow - if True, will check follow possible argument in info
        Returns:
        the TransferArgs or null if an error occurs

      • getAllInfo

        public static void getAllInfo(TransferArgs transferArgs,
                              int rank,
                              String[] args,
                              String copiedInfo)
        Get all Info in case of last argument
        Parameters:
        transferArgs - the original TransferArgs
        rank - the rank to start from in args array
        args - the original arguments
        copiedInfo - might be null, original information to copy

        public static void forceAnalyzeFollow(AbstractTransfer abstractTransfer)
        Mainly Junit, but also special command where Follow Id might be lost or not set
        Parameters:
        abstractTransfer -

      • analyzeFollow

        public static void analyzeFollow(TransferArgs transferArgs1)
        Analyze Follow option: fill it if Follow is "" (do not if null). It corrects argument of information if needed.
        Parameters:
        transferArgs1 - the current TransferArgs
